1101011010100110 0111100011001111 1 -> sum: 0100111101110110, cout: 1

0011101100101011 1010111110110000 0 -> sum: 1110101011011011, cout: 0
0100110000101111 0010000101101100 0 -> sum: 0110110110011011, cout: 0
1011000000011000 1110110110110000 0 -> sum: 1001110111001000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
